CustomField.formula: (Total_Price_With_Discount__c + Total_Tax_Amount__c + Other_Charges__c + Freight_INR__c + Freight_Tax_Amount__c) + (Tax_Code_For_Merchant__r.Rate__c) * (Total_Price_With_Discount__c + Total_Tax_Amount__c + Other_Charges__c + Freight_INR__c + Freight_Tax_Amount__c) + FREIGHT_AND_INSURANCE__c + UNLOADING_CHARGES__c
CustomField.label: Total Price With Tax
